Sample.Name: Basic Navigation
Sample.Description: Learn how to use code to zoom, pan, and rotate the map control.

Sample.Name: Set the Map Extent
Sample.Description: Learn how to set the map extent in a variety of different ways.

Sample.Name: Display a Shapefile Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a shapefile layer.

Sample.Name: Display a FileGeoDatabase Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a file geodatabase layer.

Sample.Name: Display a TinyGeo Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a TinyGeo layer.

Sample.Name: Display a S57 (Nautical Charts) Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display S57 nautical charts.

Sample.Name: Display a GPX Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a GPX layer.

Sample.Name: Display a TAB Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a TAB layer.

Sample.Name: Display an ISOLine Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display an ISOLine layer.

Sample.Name: Display an InMemory Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display an in memory layer.

Sample.Name: Display a Graticule Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a graticule line layer.

Sample.Name: Display a SQLite Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a SQLite layer.

Sample.Name: Display a Postgres Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a Postgres layer.

Sample.Name: Display an Oracle Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a Oracle layer.

Sample.Name: Display a SQL Server Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a SQL Server layer.

Sample.Name: Display a NOAA Radar Layer (TODO)
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to add NOAA Radar weather to your map.

Sample.Name: Display a NOAA Weather Station Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display NOAA weather stations current readings to your map.

Sample.Name: Display a NOAA Weather Warning Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display NOAA weather warnings to your map

Sample.Name: Display a Cloud Maps Raster Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display ThinkGeo cloud raster background images.

Sample.Name: Display a Cloud Maps Vector Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display ThinkGeo cloud vector background maps.

Sample.Name: Display a Bing Map Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a Bing Maps layer.

Sample.Name: Display a Google Map Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a Google Maps layer.

Sample.Name: Display an OpenStreetMap Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a Open Street Maps layer.

Sample.Name: Display a WMS Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a WMS layer. (This sample may be slow as we use a public WMS sever)

Sample.Name: Display an ECW Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a ECW image.

Sample.Name: Display a GeoTiff Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a GeoTiff image.

Sample.Name: Display a MrSid Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a MrSids layer.

Sample.Name: Display a ESRI Grid Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a ESRI grid layer.

Sample.Name: Display Common Raster Layers
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display common images types such as PNG, JPEG, Bitmap etc.

Sample.Name: Display a JPEG2000 Layer
Sample.Description: This sample shows how to display a JPEG2000 image.

Sample.Name: Caching Map Tiles
Sample.Description: Learn how to cache map tiles. Caching tiles on an Overlay allows you to store images of rendered areas on the local disk and reuse them for faster rendering times. Saved tile images can be found in the cache folder within this project's debug folder.

Sample.Name: Display Bing Maps Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render Bing Maps using the BingMapsOverlay. A valid Bing Maps ApplicationID is required. Visit the Bing Maps Dev Portal to sign up for a key (https://www.bingmapsportal.com/).

Sample.Name: Display Cloud Maps Raster Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render ThinkGeo Cloud Maps in raster format. Sign up for your own ThinkGeo Cloud API key at https://cloud.thinkgeo.com!

Sample.Name: Display Cloud Maps Vector Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render ThinkGeo Cloud Maps in vector format. Sign up for your own ThinkGeo Cloud API key at https://cloud.thinkgeo.com!

Sample.Name: Display Google Maps Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render Google Maps using the GoogleMapsOverlay. A Google Maps API key and secret is required. Visit the Google Maps Platform page to sign up for a key (https://cloud.google.com/maps-platform/).

Sample.Name: Display OpenStreetMap Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render OpenStreetMap using the OpenStreetMapOverlay. OpenStreetMap Tiles are not meant for heavy production use without express permission from the OpenStreetMap Foundation. See https://operations.osmfoundation.org/ for details about their usage policies.

Sample.Name: Display a WMS Overlay
Sample.Description: Learn to render a Web Map Service using the WMSOverlay. Please be aware that this is a publicly available WMS server and it may be slow to load.

Sample.Name: Draw, Edit, or Delete Shapes using the InteractiveOverlay
Sample.Description: Learn to draw, edit, or delete shapes using the map's TrackOverlay and EditOverlay.

Sample.Name: Grouping Layers Using LayerOverlay
Sample.Description: Learn to group layers into logical groups using LayerOverlays.

Sample.Name: Print Maps Using PrintOverlay
Sample.Description: Learn to print maps using the PrintOverlay.

Sample.Name: Using Markers
Sample.Description: Learn to add, edit, or remove markers on the map using the MarkerOverlay.

Sample.Name: Using Popups
Sample.Description: Learn to add, edit, or remove popups on the map using the PopupOverlay.

Sample.Name: Display a Logo Adornment
Sample.Description: Learn to render a custom logo on the map.

Sample.Name: Display Map Mouse Coordinates
Sample.Description: Learn to render coordinate info based on the mouse cursor position on the map.

Sample.Name: Display a Map ScaleLine
Sample.Description: Learn to render a ScaleLine on the map in a variety of different of styles.

Sample.Name: Display a Map PanZoomBar
Sample.Description: Learn to render a PanZoomBar on the map.

Sample.Name: Create a Point Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to style point data using a PointStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Line Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to style line data using a LineStyle

Sample.Name: Create an Area Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to style polygon data using an AreaStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Text Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to label data using a TextStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Filter Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to selectively style features using a FilterStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Heat Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to create a heat map from data using a HeatStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Cluster Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to cluster point data dynamically using a ClusterPointStyle

Sample.Name: Create a ClassBreak Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to style data based on numeric values using a ClassBreakStyle

Sample.Name: Create a Value Style
Sample.Description: Learn how to style data based on data values using a ValueStyle

Sample.Name: Setting the Projection of a Layer
Sample.Description: Learn how to automatically reproject a layer using the ProjectionConverter class

Sample.Name: Projecting Features
Sample.Description: Learn how to reproject features using the ProjectionConverter class

Sample.Name: Union Shapes
Sample.Description: Learn how to union shapes into a single shape

Sample.Name: Buffer Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to buffer a shape

Sample.Name: Simplify Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to simplify a shape's geometry

Sample.Name: Rotate Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to rotate a shape

Sample.Name: Scale Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to scale a shape

Sample.Name: Translate Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to translate a shape

Sample.Name: Calculate Center Point
Sample.Description: Learn how to calculate the center point of a feature

Sample.Name: Calculate Area
Sample.Description: Learn how to calculate the area of a feature

Sample.Name: Calculate Length
Sample.Description: Learn how to calculate the length of a line

Sample.Name: Calculate Shortest Line Between Shapes
Sample.Description: Learn how to calculate the shortest line between two shapes

Sample.Name: Get Line on a Line
Sample.Description: Learn how to get part of a line from an existing line

Sample.Name: Clip Shape
Sample.Description: Learn how to clip a shape from another shape

Sample.Name: Difference Shapes
Sample.Description: Learn how to find the difference of shapes

Sample.Name: Get Convex Hull
Sample.Description: Learn how to get the convex hull of a shape

Sample.Name: Get Envelope
Sample.Description: Learn how to get the envelope of a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature Contains
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer contain a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature Crosses
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer a shape crosses

Sample.Name: Check if Features are Disjoint
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are disjoint from a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Features are Equal
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are topologically equal to a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature Intersects
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer intersect a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature Overlaps
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer overlap a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature Touches
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are touching a shape

Sample.Name: Check if Feature is Within Another Feature
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find which features in a layer are within a shape

Sample.Name: Get Features Within a Distance
Sample.Description: Learn how to use layer query tools to find features in a layer within a given distance of a point

Sample.Name: Get Data from All Features
Sample.Description: Learn how to get data from all features in a ShapeFile

Sample.Name: Get Data from One Feature
Sample.Description: Learn how to get data from a feature in a ShapeFile

Sample.Name: Validate Point Topology
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on points

Sample.Name: Validate Line Topology
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on lines

Sample.Name: Validate Polygon Topology
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the TopologyValidator APIs to perform validation on polygons

Sample.Name: Routing
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to route through a set of waypoints with the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Routing - Service Area
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to find the service area of a location with the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Routing - Traveling Sales Person
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the RoutingCloudClient to find an optimized route through a set of waypoints with the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Elevation
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the ElevationCloudClient class to get elevation data from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Geocoding
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the GeocodingCloudClient to access the Geocoding APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Reverse Geocoding
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the ReverseGeocodingCloudClient to access the ReverseGeocoding APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Color Utilities
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the ColorCloudClient class to access the ColorUtilities APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Timezone
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the TimezoneCloudClient to access the Timezone APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Projection
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the ProjectionCloudClient to access the Projection APIs available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: World Maps Query
Sample.Description: Learn how to use the MapsQueryClient to query the WorldMaps dataset available from the ThinkGeo Cloud

Sample.Name: Interpolation Methods
Sample.Description: Learn how to do grid based interpolation using various methods
